sentences.en: All the characters in this book are imaginary.
sentences.cn: 此书中的所有人物都是虚构的.

sentences.en: Although the main characters in the novel are so true to life, they are imaginary.
sentences.cn: 虽然小说里的人物写得栩栩如生, 但都是虚构的.

sentences.en: And so the imaginary flogging was finished to his satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 这场想象的打斗以对方失败而告终,汤姆感到心满意足.

sentences.en: As she listened, she played an imaginary piano on her knees.
sentences.cn: 她边听边在膝盖上作弹钢琴状。

sentences.en: Beaming with pleasure , he raised an imaginary cup to his lips.
sentences.cn: 他作举杯就口的样子,迷迷地笑着.

sentences.en: He looked up him with veneration on the old imaginary pinnacle.
sentences.cn: 他对这个自以为高人一等的老绅士推崇备至.

sentences.en: His memories are peopled with imaginary creatures.
sentences.cn: 他满脑子虚构出来各种动物.

sentences.en: I must beg permission to give one or two imaginary illustrations.
sentences.cn: 请允许我举出一两个假想的例子.

sentences.en: Intervals can be either real or imaginary in the theory of relativity.
sentences.cn: 在相对论中,间隔可以是实数,也可以是虚数.

sentences.en: It is a spatial location defined by a real or imaginary unidimensional extent.
sentences.cn: 由虚拟的或真实的一维空间所定义的空间区域。

sentences.en: She struck a pose, one hand on her hip and the other waving an imaginary cigarette.
sentences.cn: 她摆了个姿势，一只手叉腰，另一只手夹着一支假想的香烟。

sentences.en: The equator is an imaginary line around the middle of the earth.
sentences.cn: 赤道是一条假想的环绕地球腰部的线。

sentences.en: The leaves dropped from his imaginary crown of laurel.
sentences.cn: 他想象中那顶桂冠的叶子凋零了.

sentences.en: The unicorn is an imaginary beast.
sentences.cn: 独角兽是幻想出来的动物.

sentences.en: The vertical axis is therefore called the imaginary axis.
This journey, like all the previous ones, was purely imaginary.
sentences.cn: 这次旅行也跟刚才说的那几次一样, 纯粹是幻想.

sentences.en: We must protect older people from harm, whether it is real or imaginary.
sentences.cn: 我们必须保护老人免受伤害，无论这伤害是真实的还是假想的。

words.tran_cn: 虚构的；富于想像的；有创造力的

trans.tran_en: not real, but produced from pictures or ideas in your mind
